page.title: 07NUCLEAR BOMBSHELL
page.content: "DON'T LET BEDFORDSHIRE BECOME A NUCLEAR DUMP!" It was headlines like this that accompanied the beginning of the campaign to fight the proposal that low level and intermediate radioactive waste should be stored at the Elstow storage depot. This waste would remain dangerously radioactive for at least 300 years. There is great concern in the area that : 1. Employers would avoid the area, seriously affecting local employment. 2. House prices would fall. 3. Radioactive leaks might occur,threatening the health of the local population and particularly could lead to an increase in cancer in children.
